00025 /* function ImportCSV
00026  **************************************************
00027  * Purpose : Parse the file and insert the record
00028  *          into the table import_tmp. Insert in a temporary table, if
00029  *          no confirmation is given then the data are removed otherwise
00030  *          records are inserted into import_tmp
00031  *        
00032  * parm : 
00033  *      - p_cn database connection
00034  *  - file the uploaded file
00035  *  - $p_bq_account 
00036  *  - p_format_csv file to include (depending of the bank)
00037  * gen :
00038  *      -
00039  * return:
00040  */
00041 function ImportCSV($p_cn,$file,$p_bq_account,$p_format_csv,$p_jrn)
00042 {
00043         if(!$handle = fopen($file, "r")) {
00044                 print 'could not open file. quitting';
00045                 die;
00046         }
00047 
00048 StartSql($p_cn);
00049 
00050         
00051 // include the right format for CSV --> given by the <form
00052                 include($p_format_csv);
00053 
00054         
00055         echo "Importation terminée.";
00056 
00057 // if importation succeeds then we can commit the change
00058 Commit($p_cn);
00059 /* Done by trigger
00060 // clean all the double quote
00061 $sql="update import_tmp set 
00062                 compte_ordre=replace(compte_ordre,'\"',''),
00063                 detail=replace(detail,'\"',''),
00064                 num_compte=replace(num_compte,'\"','');";
00065 ExecSql($p_cn,$sql);*/
00066 
00067 }

00069 function UpdateCSV($p_cn, $code, $poste){
00070         $sql = "update import_tmp set poste_comptable='".$poste."' where code='".$code."'";
00071         $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql);
00072 }
00073 
00074 function VerifImport($p_cn){
00075         $sql = "select * from import_tmp where poste_comptable='' or poste_comptable is null";
00076         $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql);
00077         $Num=pg_NumRows($Res);
00078         echo $Num." opérations à complèter.<br/><br/>";
00079         $i=1;
00080         while($val = pg_fetch_array($Res)){
00081                 echo '<form METHOD="POST" action="import.php?action=verif">';
00082                 echo '<input type="hidden" name="code" value="'.$val['code'].'">';
00083                 echo '<table border="1" width="500">';
00084                 echo '<tr><td width="200">'.$val['code'].'</td><td width="200">'.$val['date_exec'].'</td><td width="100">'.$val['montant'].' EUR</td><tr/>';
00085                 echo '<tr><td height="50" colspan="3">'.$val['detail'].'</td><tr/>';
00086                 echo '<tr><td>Poste Comptable : <input type="text" size="10" name="poste"></td>';
00087                 echo "<td>n° compte : ".$val['num_compte']."</td>";
00088                 echo '<td><input type="submit" value="modifier"></td><tr/>';
00089                 echo '</table>';
00090                 echo '</FORM>';
00091                 $i++;
00092         }
00093 }

00095 function TransferCSV($p_cn, $periode){
00096         //on obtient la période courante
00097         //$p_user = $_SESSION['g_user'];
00098         //$periode = GetUserPeriode($p_cn,$p_user);
00099         //$periode = $p_user->GetPeriode();
00100         // on trouve les dates frontières de cette période
00101         $sql = "select p_start,p_end from parm_periode where p_id = '".$periode."'";
00102         $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql);
00103         $val = pg_fetch_array($Res);
00104         $start = $val['p_start'];   $end = $val['p_end'];
00105         
00106         $sql = "select * from import_tmp where poste_comptable is not null and  poste_comptable <> '' 
00107             AND ok <> TRUE AND date_exec BETWEEN '".$start."' and '".$end."'";
00108         $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql);
00109         //echo "boucle: ".sizeof($Res)."<br/>";
00110         //while($val = pg_fetch_array($Res)){
00111         $Max=pg_NumRows($Res);
00112         echo $Max." opérations à transférer.<br/>";
00113         for ($i = 0;$i < $Max;$i++) {
00114                 $val=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00115                 
00116                 $code=$val['code']; $date_exec=$val['date_exec']; $montant=$val['montant']; $num_compte=$val['num_compte']; 
00117                 $poste_comptable=$val['poste_comptable'];$bq_account=$val['bq_account'];
00118                 $jrn=$val['jrn'];
00119 
00120                 list($annee, $mois, $jour) = explode("-", $date_exec);
00121                 $date_exec = $jour.".".$mois.".".$annee;
00122 
00123                 // Vérification que le poste comptable trouvé existe
00124                 $sqltest = "select * from tmp_pcmn WHERE pcm_val='".$poste_comptable."'";
00125                 $Restest=ExecSql($p_cn,$sqltest);
00126                 $test=pg_NumRows($Restest);
00127                 if($test == 0) {
00128                         $sqlupdate = "update import_tmp set poste_comptable='' WHERE code='".$code."' AND num_compte='".$num_compte."'";
00129                         $Resupdate=ExecSql($p_cn,$sqlupdate);
00130                         echo "Poste comptable erronné pour l'opération ".$num_compte."-".$code.", réinitialisation du poste comptable<br/>";
00131                 } else {
00132 
00133                 // Finances
00134         
00135                 //$seq = GetNextId($p_cn,'j_grpt')+1;
00136                 $seq=NextSequence($p_cn,'s_grpt');
00137                 $p_user = $_SESSION['g_user'];
00138                 //$periode = GetUserPeriode($p_cn,$p_user);
00139                 //$periode = $User->GetPeriode();
00140                 StartSql($p_cn);
00141 
00142                 $r=InsertJrnx($p_cn,"d",$p_user,$jrn,$bq_account,$date_exec,$montant,$seq,$periode);
00143                 if ( $r == false) { $Rollback($p_cn);exit("error 'import_inc.php' __LINE__");}
00144         
00145                 $r=InsertJrnx($p_cn,"c",$p_user,$jrn,$poste_comptable,$date_exec,$montant,$seq,$periode);
00146                 if ( $r == false) { $Rollback($p_cn);exit("error 'import_inc.php' __LINE__");}
00147 
00148                 //remove annoying double-quote
00149                 $num_compte=str_replace('"','',$num_compte);
00150                 $code=str_replace('\"','',$code);
00151         
00152                 $r=InsertJrn($p_cn,$date_exec,NULL,$jrn,$num_compte." ".$code,$montant,$seq,$periode);
00153                 if ( $r == false ) { Rollback($p_cn); exit(" Error 'import_inc.php' __LINE__");}
00154                   
00155                 //$sql = "insert into jrn (jr_def_id,jr_montant,jr_comment,jr_date,jr_grpt_id,jr_tech_per) values ( ".$p_jrn.", abs(".round($montant,2)."), '".$num_compte." ".$code."','".$date_valeur."','".$seq."','".$periode."')";
00156                 SetInternalCode($p_cn,$seq,$jrn);
00157 
00158 
00159                 echo "Tranfer de l'opération ".$code." effectué<br/>";
00160                 $sql2 = "update import_tmp set ok=TRUE where code='".$code."'";
00161                 $Res2=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql2);
00162 
00163                 Commit($p_cn);
00164                 }
00165         }
00166 }
00167 /* function ShowForm
00168  **************************************************
00169  * Purpose : ShowForm for getting data about 
00170  *           the bank transfert in cvs
00171  *        
00172  * parm :  database connection
00173  *      -
00174  * gen :
00175  *      -
00176  * return: none
00177  */

00179 function ShowFormTransfert($p_cn){
00180 $w=new widget("select");
00181   echo '<FORM METHOD="POST" action="import.php?action=import" enctype="multipart/form-data">';
00182   echo '<INPUT TYPE="file" name="fupload" size="20"><br>';
00183   // ask for the journal target 
00184   $jrn=make_array ($p_cn,"select jrn_def_id,jrn_def_name from jrn_def where jrn_def_type='FIN';");
00185   $w->label='Journal';
00186   echo $w->label." :".$w->IOValue('import_jrn',$jrn)."<br>";
00187   // choose the bank account
00188   $bq=make_array($p_cn,"select pcm_val,pcm_lib from tmp_pcmn where pcm_val like '550%'");
00189   $w->label='Banque';
00190   echo "Compte en banque :".$w->IOValue('import_bq',$bq)."<br>";
00191   $format_csv=make_array($p_cn,"select include_file,name from format_csv_banque;");
00192   $w->label="Format import";
00193   echo $w->label.$w->IOValue('format_csv',$format_csv).'<br>';
00194   echo '<INPUT TYPE="SUBMIT" Value="Import fiche">';
00195   echo '</FORM>';
00196 }
